item.description:
See theSuperchief TrioLive at
Providence Swings Dance "The Dirty Dozen Weekend"
May 4 2012
8:30pm
Providence Tango Studio
Providence Tango Studio, 99 South Bend St, Pawtucket, RI
Pawtucket. RI
for more info - click on
www.providenceswings.com
www.dirtydozenweekend.com


Friday Night Dance at the Providence Tango Studio
7:30 pm Doors Open: Registration and check-in, plus competition check-in and mugshots. Competitors must register and check in by 10:00pm!
8:30 pm â€“ 12:00 am First Draw Dance with live music by the largest trio in Rhode Island, the SUPERCHIEF TRIO! (If just attending the dance, $12 at the door)
10:45 pm Mash-up Jack & Jill Prelims, Cost: $5. All proceeds from the competition entry fee will go to the RI Food Bank. Additional food donations will be accepted at the door.
item.name: Swing Dance and more
